casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donnie Ray WINSTON. No. 624P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. James C. Holloway, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of December 2006 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of January 2007."
